name: Darkway Street
description:
The main character on the way to the house meets many obstacles. To still get home, he needs to walk the entire length of Darkway street. 
Traps on the road, designed so as not to miss anyone. And impudent cats personally monitor the order on this dark street.
P.S.: Number of levels - INFINITE!

Сontrol via the A-D and Space keys, or buttons on the screen. You can disable on-screen buttons in settings.
